column4: I have formatted my whole system form ubuntu 12.04 to ubuntu 12.04. I have backed up all my downloaded packages using APTonCD. and using APTonCD i have restores all my packages to /var/cache/apt/archives but when I try to install any software thro synaptic or ubuntu software center it against start downloading. how do I inform the system that "these packages are already present in the system so do not try to download." help me out please

I have formatted my whole system form ubuntu 12.04 to ubuntu 12.04. I have backed up all my downloaded packages using APTonCD. and using APTonCD i have restores all my packages to /var/cache/apt/archives but when I try to install any software thro synaptic or ubuntu software center it against start downloading. how do I inform the system that "these packages are already present in the system so do not try to download." help me out please
